articles.title: Veteran analyst has blunt message on Intel stock

articles.summary: TheStreet: Veteran analyst has blunt message on Intel stock. Intel stock is trading approximately 0.52% lower at $36.16 as of the time of writing. The stock is down, due to a Reuters report stating that Nvidia has decided not to manufacture its chips using Intel’s 18A node (manufacturing process) after conducting some testing. articles.title: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?
articles.mainIdea: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is AMD’s Soaring AI Fueled Share Price Still Justified in 2025?. If you are wondering whether Advanced Micro Devices at around $215 a share is still a smart buy or if the big gains are largely behind it, you are not alone. This is exactly the question we are going to unpack. The stock is up 8.5% over the last week and 78.3% year to date, building on a 70.3% gain over the past year and a 243.7% return over three years that has reset expectations and risk perceptions for investors. Recent headlines have focused on AMD expanding its presence in artificial... Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.

articles.summary: TheStreet: Nvidia makes its biggest purchase ever.
